additionalDescription: They separate the gibbons and the background noise into different audio files for the clips recordings.
description: We provide a benchmark for the automated detection of southern yellow-cheeked crested gibbon calls recorded using passive acoustic monitoring in Jahoo, Cambodia
name: Yellow-cheeked crested gibbon
title: Dataset for 'Benchmarking for the automated detection of southern yellow-cheeked crested gibbon calls from passive acoustic monitoring data'
